body.text:
{% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Batutuwan da aka zaba: Warin baki 
Zaɓi tambayoyin cikin jerin da ke ƙasa, don samun shawarwarin kula da baki

 1. Warin Bakin safiya
 2. Warin baki bayan cin abinci
 3. Yanay mara dadi{%else%}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Selected Topic: Bad breath

 Choose an option

 1. Morning bad breath.
 2. Bad breath after food.
 3. Bad Feeling.{%endif%}

rows.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Warin Bakin Safiya{%else%}Morning Bad Breath{%endif%}
rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Idan na farka da safe baki na yana yin wari{%else%}When I get up in the morning my mouth smells bad.{%endif%}

sections.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Warin Baki: 2{%else%}Bad Breath: 2{%endif%}

rows.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Kamshi Bayan Abinci{%else%}Bad breath after food{%endif%}
rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Baki na ya na wari idan na gama cin abinci{%else%}My mouth smells bad after eating{%endif%}

sections.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Warin Baki: 3{%else%}Bad Breath: 3{%endif%}

rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Baki na yana wari kuma yana kunyata ni{%else%}My mouth smells bad and I feel embarrassed.{%endif%}
